original_title: IMAX - L5: First City in Space
overview: Ready for the countdown to tomorrow?  Raring to swoop over the rippled red terrain of Mars or touch down on an icy comet?  Or do you simply prefer to tune to Channel 29 of your virtual-reality set and join friends for fun and games?  L5: First City in Space is your port of departure for all this and more.
tagline: In 100 years people will live among the planets.  Come take a journey into the future.
title: L5: First City in Space
